description: Architectural Leadership: Spearheaded the complete migration of legacy code modules to Clean Architecture, significantly enhancing system scalability and testability.
Offline-First Strategy: Engineered a high-performance local data layer with ISAR Database, optimizing real-time message caching for a seamless offline experience.
Design System: Led the collaboration with UX/UI designers to build a unified Design System and reusable widget library, significantly cutting development time and ensuring UI/UX consistency.
Real-time & Security: Architected low-latency messaging via Socket.io/LiveKit, incorporating secure authentication, message reactions, and E2EE for privacy and engagement.
High-Scale Impact: Served as a core developer for a platform with 800k+ downloads and 50k+ MAU, directly contributing to 80% of all major core features.
Ecosystem Management: Developed and maintained the entire Flutter ecosystem, including Client and Doctor apps for both iOS and Android using Bloc and GetX.
Telehealth & E-commerce: Integrated stable Voice/Video features via Agora.io and implemented secure end-to-end shopping flows with integrated payment gateways.
DevOps: Automated deployment to App Store/Google Play via CI/CD pipelines, reducing manual release overhead.
Developed E-commerce and Video Streaming apps and built Platform Channels for native Android/iOS integration.
